newsitem.title: USA: USDA seeks 1.31 mln lbs frozen pork for programs.
newsitem.headline: USDA seeks 1.31 mln lbs frozen pork for programs.

text.p: The Agricultural Marketing Service (AMS) of the U.S. Department of Agriculture said it was seeking to buy 1,306,000 lbs of frozen fine ground pork, bulk pork sausage and pork sausage patties (1.5 and 3.0 ounce) for distribution to eligible outlets.
All offers must be in the format prescribed in LS-50 and be received by 1500 EST in Washington, D.C., on Friday, November 29, 1996. Acceptances will be announced by midnight Friday, December 6, 1996.
Shipments must be made between January 5 and 18, it said.
